title: Ottoman and Mughal Images Gunpowder MCQ 3

content.prompt: Which of the following imperial expansions was most similar to those of the Ottoman and Mughal Empires?

choices.label: The Dutch Empire in South Africa and Indonesia
The Spanish Empire in the Americas and Asia
The Manchu Empire in East Asia

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
